tags.name: hax-text-editor
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor`

Attributes:

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

  * `toolbar` {`string`} - The id for the toolbar

  * `type` {`string`} - The type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
the default toolbar if neither.

  * `id` {`string`} - The editor's unique id

Properties:

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

  * `toolbar` {`string`} - The id for the toolbar

  * `type` {`string`} - The type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
the default toolbar if neither.

  * `id` {`string`} - The editor's unique id

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
`placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

Property: placeholder

Default: Click to edit

attributes.name: toolbar
attributes.description:
`toolbar` {`string`} - The id for the toolbar

Property: toolbar

Default:

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
`type` {`string`} - The type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
the default toolbar if neither.

Property: type

Default: hax-text-editor-toolbar

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
`id` {`string`} - The editor's unique id

Property: id

Default:

tags.name: hax-text-editor-inline
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor-inline`

Events:

  * `command-val-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `range-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `toggled-command-val-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `element` - 

  * `__promptFields` {`any[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `__oldValue` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `__selectionContents` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `inlineWidget` {`boolean`} - is the element a custom inline widget element?

  * `fields` {`string`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `value` - The prefilled value of the prompt

  * `__prompt` - the prompt that pops up when button is pressed

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `rich-text-editor` that the toolbar controls.

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `command-val` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `tag` {`string`} - the tag that will wrap the selected range

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggled-command-val` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

Properties:

  * `element` - 

  * `__promptFields` {`any[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `__oldValue` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `__selectionContents` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `editableSelection` {`boolean`} - 

  * `inlineWidget` {`boolean`} - is the element a custom inline widget element?

  * `fields` {`string`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `value` - The prefilled value of the prompt

  * `__prompt` - the prompt that pops up when button is pressed

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `rich-text-editor` that the toolbar controls.

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `commandVal` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `tag` {`string`} - the tag that will wrap the selected range

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledCommand` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggledCommandVal` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `blockSelectors` {`string`} - 

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `labelStyle` {`"offscreen" | null`} - label is offscreen (screenreader-only)

  * `isToggled` {`boolean`} - whether button is toggled

  * `validCommands` {`string[]`} - gets valid commands list

  * `operationCommand` - gets command param for document.execCommand

  * `operationCommandVal` - gets value param for document.execCommand

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

tags.description:
`hax-text-editor-toolbar`

Events:

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: any; }>`} - 

  * `deselect-rich-text-editor-editor` {`CustomEvent<{ toolbar: this; editor: any; }>`} - 

  * `select-rich-text-editor-editor` {`CustomEvent<{ toolbar: this; editor: any; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `controls` {`string`} - `id` of `rich-text-editor` that toolbar controls.

  * `editor` - `rich-text-editor` element that is currently in `contenteditable` mode

  * `id` {`string`} - `rich-text-editor` unique id

  * `savedSelection` - current text selected range.

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `canceled` - keep toolbar visible even when not editor not focused
/

tags.name: hax-text-editor-vocab
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor-vocab`

Events:

  * `command-val-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `range-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `toggled-command-val-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `__promptFields` {`any[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `__oldValue` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `__selectionContents` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `inlineWidget` {`boolean`} - is the element a custom inline widget element?

  * `fields` {`({} | {})[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `value` - The prefilled value of the prompt

  * `__prompt` - the prompt that pops up when button is pressed

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `rich-text-editor` that the toolbar controls.

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `command-val` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `tag` {`string`} - the tag that will wrap the selected range

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggled-command-val` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

Properties:

  * `__promptFields` {`any[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `__oldValue` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `__selectionContents` - the contents node inside the selected range

  * `editableSelection` {`boolean`} - 

  * `inlineWidget` {`boolean`} - is the element a custom inline widget element?

  * `fields` {`({} | {})[]`} - fields for the prompt popover.

  * `value` - The prefilled value of the prompt

  * `__prompt` - the prompt that pops up when button is pressed

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `rich-text-editor` that the toolbar controls.

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `commandVal` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for the editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `tag` {`string`} - the tag that will wrap the selected range

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledCommand` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggledCommandVal` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `blockSelectors` {`string`} - 

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `labelStyle` {`"offscreen" | null`} - label is offscreen (screenreader-only)

  * `isToggled` {`boolean`} - whether button is toggled

  * `validCommands` {`string[]`} - gets valid commands list

  * `operationCommand` - gets command param for document.execCommand

  * `operationCommandVal` - gets value param for document.execCommand

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Is the button disabled? Default is false.

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

tags.name: hax-text-editor
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor`

Attributes:

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

  * `toolbar` {`string`} - The id for the toolbar

  * `type` {`string`} - The type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
the default toolbar if neither.

  * `id` {`string`} - The editor's unique id

Properties:

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

  * `toolbar` {`string`} - The id for the toolbar

  * `type` {`string`} - The type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
the default toolbar if neither.

  * `id` {`string`} - The editor's unique id
